lede: Government, Public Sector and Taxes covers the latest figures for what the UK public sector has raised in revenue,spent and invested. The headline statistic is for Public Sector Net Borrowing which is a measure of the amount of money the Government has had to borrow in order to bridge the gap between expenditure and revenue. The other key statistics are Surplus on Current Budget and Public Sector Net Debt.
name: Government, Public Sector and Taxes
